name: Minesweeper Analysis
description:
A minesweeper variant that can test your minesweeper skill and reaction time.

Control: Mouse, touch screen

Feature:

6*6 board with pre-open tiles

20 random stages

1 click per board, if the tile is safe, go to the next stage

Mobile friendly (prefer Google Chrome)

No flags allowed

Score grading:

S: >=2200

A+: 1900-2199

A-: 1600-1899

B+: 1300-1599

B-: 1000-1299

C+: 600-999

C-: <=599
